name: Letters that are present but not in the right place

testSteps.description:
Given the target word is:
| B | L | A | N | D |

When the player enters the following letters:
| B | R | A | I | N |

Then the squares should be colored as follows:
| GREEN | GRAY | GREEN | GRAY | YELLOW |

userStory.narrative:
The rules of Wordle are simple. Your objective is to guess a secret fiveGRAYletter word in as few guesses as possible.
  To submit a guess, type any fiveGRAYletter word and press enter.
  All of your guesses must be real words, according to a dictionary of fiveGRAYletter words that Wordle allows as guesses.

  Players have to guess a fiveGRAYletter word.
  GRAY Correctly placed letters are shown as GREEN
  GRAY Incorrectly placed letters are shown as YELLOW
  GRAY Letters not appearing in the word are represented as GRAY

title: Letters that are present but not in the right place

rule.name: Incorrectly placed letters appear in yellow
